node.name: Baby Walker MAKE: Sunbaby
node.description: Three positioned height can be adjusted according to the convenience of child and also soft cushion offer maximum comfort to soft skin. Fitted with musical toys for entertainment, easy to fold & can be stored easily when not is use. Durable rolling castor can deal outdoor and indoor ground surfaces. (FOR: 0-2 year / CARRY WEIGHT: 20 Kg / MATERIAL: Plastic & Fabric)
node.content: Every baby reaches the walking milestone at a different time, however baby will likely take their first steps between 9 and 15 months / With offline major market this Indian brand make one of the safest, strong and sturdy walker for growing babies / Supported with a strong frame which is height adjustable at three different levels and can hold the weight up to 20 Kg / Seat is strong with double stitching seams and thick cushioning to support the weight / Rotatable butterfly toys with special one finger press music and 5 different tones to keep baby happy & joyful / Heavy duty plastic wheels allow the baby to move in any direction but it is advised for adult supervision when the baby is using the walker / Easy to disassemble when not in use, fold and kept in corner / One of the first learning toy for babies between 2-3 age which can provide ease for parents in teaching first walk to their babies.

node.name: Educational Globe MAKE: Mobilizar Technologies Pvt Ltd
node.description: Interactive, educational globe with fun fact with no markings of border and names. Sparks creativity and encourage the child to explore and discover on their own. Information is compatible with Orboot app which is free on iOS and Android platform. Unknown information can be found using app, scan the tag picture on physical globe and information will be displayed on screen which can be read in English & Hindi language. (SIZE: 250mm Diameter / GUIDE: BOOK + APP / WEIGHT: 1.5 Kg)
node.content: Informational toy from Indian company for development of mind in young ages / Package consist globe, passport replica, stamp, country flag sticker and detailed help guide / Search and learn the information through app or from guide / More than 400 highlights and 1000 facts regarding cultures, monuments, inventions, animals, weather / Parents can learn and teach the general knowledge using this globe, also act as a game which eventually increase the gaining power of mind / Manufacturer recommended the age for 4 -10 years but early age like 2 year set up the curiosity which ultimately build knowledge on factual basis / Made with GI sheet which is painted with highly durable metal paint and make it scratch proof / Project under Internet of Things which is among the top most technology in current generation.
node.alt: Shifu Orboot The Educational Augmented Reality Based Globe  STEM Toy for Boys & Girls Age 4 to 10 years  Ideal Gift for Kids No Borders or Names on Globe

node.name: Inflatable bath tubs MAKE: Cho Cho
node.description: Soft, air-filled bottom which makes it comfortable during use, practical, durable, easy to use and clean. Big size drain plugs in the bottom for water release, this bath has been engineered for children comfort and for complete flexibility within home, gardens, resorts. This rectangular pool act like real pool for use in the open space, save children & family members from hot summer. (SIZE: 1450x1050x500mm / WEIGHT: 3 Kg / MATERIAL: Rubber Pvc)
node.content: Children’s love to play with water and if we talk about the summer season than swimming pool becomes playground / This mini swimming pool inflate within 3 minutes using electrical air pump which comes along with the package / Air filled bottom and edges can withstand the weight up to 65 Kg, an adult light weight person / 3 layered Pvc is durable against wear-tear and resist the small nails but still any type of puncture could be fixed at local shops / Capacity enough to fit 3 children of age 2-3 year or 1 adult man of height 6 feet / Drainage duct which is placed at bottom is leak proof and this mini swimming pool can be placed indoor / Tested against mild warm water and under affordable price this mini swimming pool best suits for 2-3 year old children.
node.alt: ChoCho Inflatable Bath Tubs Inflatable Swimming Bath Tub for Kids and Adults with Pump Multicolor 5 ft

node.name: Educational Pack MAKE: Einstein Box
node.description: 90% of a child's brain is developed in the first 6 years and crucial learning of starting turns into a good habit. This box contains beautiful books and fun activities that help a child develop a love for books, build thinking skills, develop child's curiosity and imagination. Laminated paper that is hard to tear and completely waterproof against any odd spill during eating and learning, also finger paint set for creativity. (BOOKS QUANTITY: 2 / ACTIVITY OR GAME: 3 / COLOUR: Finger paint)
node.content: Human brain develop rapidly in younger age and with good direction through books parents can teach many good things which turns into habit / Often seen these days that small children’s are very much attractive toward mobile phones / Einstein box is full of informational and educational material that attracts small children with its quality presentation / 2 quality story books teach about the healthy eating habits and famous places around the world / Non- toxic colours set and wearing apron for creativity / Puzzle set for entertainment which improve the skills in early age and develop the curiosity / Match the column is wide acceptable teaching technique, 3 activity puzzles are based on matching the correct information / Most acceptable and gifted item for 2 year old children that can draw the attention from mobile which is not good for early age.
node.alt: Einstein Box for 2 Year Old Baby Boys and Girls Learning and Educational Gift Pack of Toys and Books Multicolour

node.name: Educational toy computer MAKE: Super toy
node.description: Digital book with basic level of information primarily required between the ages of 2nd and 3rd. Numbers, alphabets are must notice information and identification of animals also help the children to know about other living creatures. With LED screen to show the information like spelling of words. Power cable enabled and therefore no battery is required to play this device. (SIZE: 218x190x35mm / WEIGHT: 250 grams / LANGUAGE: English)
node.content: At small age children’s are more comfortable in learning with plug & play devices / Educational computer like this super toy helps in early age of learning with alphabets and numbers / Small LED display is tuned with audio and connected to buttons which make it classroom experience for 2 year children / Visualizing the pre-school and the things which teach there is mostly configured in this educational computer / Audio stories like 'Hari and the Cloud' & 'Panchatantra' is inserted for fun and also poem, melodies create the interesting atmosphere / Durable wear and tear plastic body and heavy duty button withstand against the regular press / Propose item for 2-3 year old children so that sending to pre-school is get avoided.
node.alt: Super Toy Educational Computer Abc And 123 Learning Kids Laptop With LED Display And Music MultiColor

node.name: Mini Keys Musical Keyboard MAKE: Casio Store
node.description: 32 mini sized keys, built for younger players and would fit comfortably in child's hand. Built-in instruments tone, LSI source and 8 note polyphony ensure good quality sound. LCD display acts as an excellent visual guide for selecting different music options. Easier to operate and 3.5mm jack to connect headphones. (SIZE: 470x230x70mm / WEIGHT: 1Kg / BATTERY TYPE: 1AA)
node.content: Casio is a trusted brand from Japan which deal in electronic instruments / Explore the 100 tones, 50 rhythms and find an incredible variety of life-like instruments / LSI(Large signal identification) source helps to reduce the noise from speaker and deliver the crystal clear sound of 32 mini keys / Easy to switch between piano & organ tone with an on-board button, 5 percussion pads help to showcase creativity in each performance / 10 built-in songs like 'Little brown jug', 'Jingle bells' & 'Silent night' keep the child engaged / Portable and operate through 6 AA batteries /  Best gifting item to start the musical journey of any child above 2 years.
node.alt: Casio SA46 32 Mini Keys Musical Keyboard BlackGreen
